extendedInfo.description: Are you revealing secrets while sleep talking? Do you snore? Or want to catch your family doing the same? Use DreamCatcher to monitor noise while you sleep and automatically start recording all of your snoring/sleep talking!------------------------------------------------DreamCatcher Pro uses an advanced recording system to monitor and record any noise while you sleep. It's not a continuous recording, so you'll wakeup to find short clips of audio which are guaranteed to make you laugh!

reviews.comment: Anyone know why it starts recording at 7 .55pm everytime.can you set a clock b4 u go to bed?? Otherwise crap.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Good
reviews.comment: I think in theory it is a great concept.  However, it only records little snippets and that is very frustrating.  It records more background noise than actual talking in my sleep or my dog talking in his.  It would be nice to actually be able to save \"special\" recordings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: OK, but getting better, could be 5 with a few improvements. Galaxy Tab.\tSimple, does what it says, now has \'delete all\' option, still needs option to archive selected recordings, & option to adjust length of soundbites :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy 2
reviews.comment: this app just crap didn\'t record anything and completely drained my battery
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very cool app
reviews.comment: Used this last night and was shocked to hear myself in the morning. I love this.
reviews.author: Duke Barrett

reviews.title: Love It!
reviews.comment: I love this app. It works great on my HTC Sensation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what this sleep talker needed!
reviews.comment: My wife wouldn\'t stop pestering me about the countless nights that I talked in my sleep. I didn\'t believe her until I got this app. And now I can record all of her sleep ramblings!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quiet recordings on Galaxy SII
reviews.comment: A great idea but as below needs an option to delete all recordings not just individual. Barely audible recordings on Galaxy SII at max volume.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mediocre
reviews.comment: Records just fine. But it needs the ability to archive recordings and add the ability to send in a text message.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Needs button to delete all at once
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, no BS way to record sleep talking. Resolves longstanding arguments with spouse. I can definitely imagine some other uses of this app besides sleep talking... Droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Brilliant app, after it was updated works brilliant on my HTC wildfire, best and most fun app out there
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple design, looks promising
reviews.comment: It does exactly what it promises - record dreams. Looking forward to more features!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: It records but only for a couple of seconds at a time and then does the same again so the result is loads of 1-2 second recordings of the same event
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very disappointing, almost too basic, do not pay for this!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
